title: Stacey Abrams Has No Heart | Daily Best of September 23 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Stacey Abrams claims that "there is no such thing as a heartbeat at six weeks. It is a manufactured sound designed to convince people that men have the right to take control of a woman's body." Wow. In other news, people keep going too far with their emotional support animals, as we take a look at a pet alligator and a lynx! And we update you on the latest as Bubba recovers after surgery to remove a tumor from his liver. Your continued prayers are not going unnoticed, and we can't wait to have him back with us in the studio!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
